original_title: Masquerade, a Story of the Old South
overview: 1848 Virginia. Slave couple Sam and Ninny execute an escape after their slave master George makes an unconscionable advance. Inspired by a true story, 'Masquerade, A Story of the Old South' is an uncommon slave narrative, capturing the experience of both African Americans and gay people during this complicated time.
title: Masquerade, a Story of the Old South
